mapper.select: SELECT B.qnaNo, B.title, B.userId, B.writer, B.pw, B.content, B.hit, B.writedate, B.asw_code, B.asw_writer, B.asw_content, B.asw_date, (SELECT count(*) FROM qna_comment WHERE qnano=B.qnaNo) commentCnt FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM qna ORDER BY qnano DESC )A ORDER BY rnum )B WHERE B.rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT qnaNo, title, userId, writer, pw, content, hit, writedate, asw_code, asw_writer, asw_content, asw_date, () commentCnt FROM qna WHERE qnano = #{qnaNo}
SELECT commentno ,qnano ,writer ,id ,content ,writedate FROM qna_comment WHERE qnano = #{qnaNo} ORDER BY commentno
SELECT commentno ,qnano ,writer ,id ,content ,writedate FROM qna_comment WHERE commentno = #{commentNo }
